pipeline_report.ai_key_differences_prompt:
You are provided weekly weighted pipeline snapshots (this week vs last week).
Totals: last week €832,735, this week €835,735 (Δ +3000).
For each stage you have current/previous values, absolute & % change, and top contributing deals.
Write: (1) a concise overview paragraph of the general trend, (2) 3–5 bullets with the biggest positive/negative stage changes and notable deals, and (3) a short conclusion on pipeline health and next focus.
Keep it factual and succinct for a leadership slide.
bullet_points: Total moved from €832,735 to €835,735 (+3000).
Top positive stage: Negotiate (Δ €3,000).
Top negative stage: Discover (Δ €0).
Largest deal movers are included per stage; focus on progressing mid-to-late stages to sustain momentum.
pipeline_report.overview_paragraph: This week’s weighted pipeline increased by €3,000, with the largest positive movement in Negotiate.

rep_insights.analysis_paragraph: Merel Schouten has shown considerable activity this week with eight meetings and several tasks but has faced stagnation in multiple deals. Some deals have experienced movements, including an advancement of a deal to 'Close'. However, there were also losses and stagnations without next activities scheduled.
bullet_points: Advancement: ABN AMRO Bank N.V. deal moved from Propose to Close.
Loss: Sunny Cars Usability deal was lost while in Develop stage.
Stagnation: Multiple deals have not changed stages in over 14 days.
No next activity scheduled for several key deals.
